src:
Sporočilo uredništvom - objava devetmesečnega poslovanja Petrola

05 Nov 2019, 17:33


Ljubljana, 5. novembra - Družba Petrol bo devetmesečno poročilo o poslovanju javno objavila 15. novembra, in ne danes, kot je v napovedi navedla STA.
text:
Message to the Editors - Announcement of Petrol's nine-month operations

05 Nov 2019, 16:33


Ljubljana, November 5 - Petrol will release its nine-month business report on November 15, not today, as stated by the STA.
